data.persona: I am part of the army. I one common among the others. I do not like those who stand out.
data.description:
You are in the Beside church entrance.
Ornate stonework covers the building. A towering arch of marble and silver line the entrance, giving the church a most grand appearance. Holy idols gaze upon the entrance, as  they flank the walkway to entrance side by side.
There's a painting of Mother Mary, a Ornate stonework, a walkway, an entrance, a church, a towering arch of marble and silver, a building, and an idol here.
The king's architect is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a coat.

data.short_motivation: I must do what is expected of everyone before going into the church
data.mid_motivation: I do not want to incur the anger of the idol by flouting its traditions
data.long_motivation: I want myself to be an example to the others so that they should also conform
